thread.title: Default iOS Apps to Be Removable, Says Tim Cook
thread.title_full: Default iOS Apps to Be Removable, Says Tim Cook - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Default iOS Apps to Be Removable, Says Tim Cook
text: In an interview with BuzzFeed News, Apple's CEO Tim Cook made it public that removing pre-installed apps on an iOS device might be possible in the future. According to the same statement by Tim Cook, even though default iOS app erasing is on the table as a future iOS feature, not all Apple iOS apps will be given this treatment. This is because even though you don't really like some of the iOS apps your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch, there are a number of them that get used ... Â»
